name: Dinari ARKB
description: The Dinari ARKB dShares token (ARKB.d) is a 1:1 backed token representing ownership of the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF. Each ARKB.d token is fully collateralized by an equivalent ETF share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, ARKB.d provides investors with a compliant and secure way to gain exposure to Bitcoin through a regulated financial product. It enables features like 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, offering a bridge between traditional financial products and digital innovation.
